column1: The Purple Pig////The special that day was sausage with black truffle and egg
column2: all on top of an English muffin ($23). This dish actually came out first (aside from the glass of Babic Reserve)
column3: and it was definitely my FAVORITE dish I had here. The sausage and the black truffle were so flavorful
column4: and the egg was nice and runny. The dish was brought out with a knife
column5: so I ended up eating it with a knife and fork rather than as a sandwich because it was a bit messy.
